text: He muminagana! Tomara allahara kache ta'oba kara---bisud'dha ta'oba [1]; sambhabata tomadera raba tomadera papasamuha mocana kare debena ebam tomaderake prabesa karabena jannate, yara padadese nadi prabahita. Sedina allaha lanchita karabena na nabike ebam tara sathe yara imana eneche taderake. Tadera nura tadera samane o dane dhabita habe. Tara balabe, â€˜he amadera raba!
